snippet: Human Rights Watch is urging Rwandan authorities to charge or free the wife of an opposition figure who it says has been held incommunicado for more than two weeks....

headline.main: Harry Potter Play Gets 11 Olivier Awards Nominations
headline.print_headline: Harry Potter Play Gets 11 Olivier Awards Nominations

lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch is urging Rwandan authorities to charge or free the wife of an opposition figure who it says has been held incommunicado for more than two weeks.
